alert.note: Alert for Pointe Coupee; West Feliciana (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 29 at 10:14PM CST until November 29 at 10:45PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern West Feliciana Parish in southeastern Louisiana... North central Pointe Coupee Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 1045 PM CST. * At 1013 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Wakefield, or 9 miles northwest of St. Francisville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wakefield and Spillman. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
